__prompts__.mission_name: What is the name of the mission or (preferably) its acronym?
__prompts__.instr_name: What is the name of the instrument or (preferably) its acronym?
__prompts__.author_name: List the author of the package, first then last name. You can add more authors in pyproject.toml.
__prompts__.author_email: Provide a contact email for the author. You can also leave this blank.
__prompts__.github_repo: Provide a url to your code repository. Leave blank if you don't have this yet.
__prompts__.readthedocs_url: Provide a url to your readthedocs documentation. Leave blank if you don't have one.
__prompts__.project_url: Provide a url to your website if you have one. Leave blank if you don't have this yet.
__prompts__.minimum_python_version: What minimum Python version do you want to impose for your package? See https://devguide.python.org/versions/.
